core_services.name: Life Insurance
core_services.description: Protect your family's future with comprehensive life insurance policies.

core_services.name: Auto & Commercial
core_services.description: Coverage for your personal vehicles, classic cars, and commercial fleets.

core_services.name: Property Insurance
core_services.description: Secure your home and belongings against unforeseen events.

core_services.name: Health Insurance
core_services.description: Access quality healthcare with individual and family plans.

core_services.name: Group Benefits
core_services.description: Offer your employees valuable benefits like health and disability coverage.

life.name: Whole Life Insurance
life.description: Permanent coverage that builds cash value over time.

life.name: Universal Life Insurance
life.description: Flexible premiums and adjustable death benefits.

life.name: Indexed Universal Life (IUL)
life.description: Tied to market performance (e.g., S&P 500) with downside protection.

life.name: Term Life
life.description: Affordable coverage for a set period (10, 20, 30 years).

life.name: Term Life with Living Benefits
life.description: Adds protection for illness or injury.
benefits: Access cash while living for critical, chronic, or terminal conditions.

auto.name: Passenger Auto
auto.description: Protection for your everyday cars, trucks, and SUVs.
benefits: Covers liability for bodily injury and property damage
Comprehensive coverage for theft, fire, and other non-collision events

auto.name: Classic & Custom Cars
auto.description: Tailored coverage for collectible and modified vehicles.

auto.name: Commercial (Heavy-Duty) Vehicles
auto.description: Coverage for trucks, fleets, and contractor vehicles.
benefits: Protects against liability from business operations

property.name: Homeowners Insurance
property.description: Comprehensive protection for your home, personal belongings, and liability.
benefits: Covers damage to your dwelling and other structures
Protects personal property like furniture and electronics
Provides liability coverage for accidents on your property

property.name: Renters Insurance
property.description: Protects your personal items within a rental property and provides liability coverage.
benefits: Covers living expenses if your rental becomes uninhabitable

property.name: Theft, Flood & Fire Coverage
property.description: Specialized add-ons for protection against specific perils.
benefits: Coverage for losses due to theft
Protection from flood damage (often a separate policy)
Financial security in case of a fire

health.name: Health & Dental
health.description: Individual and family medical coverage to ensure you have access to the care you need.
benefits: Access to a network of quality healthcare providers
Coverage for preventive care to stay healthy

group-benefits.name: Supplemental Health Plans
group-benefits.description: Help protect your income and savings during an unexpected illness or injury.
benefits: Cash benefits paid directly to you

group-benefits.name: Family Health Insurance
group-benefits.description: Group options to provide comprehensive health coverage for dependents and employees.
benefits: Often more affordable than individual plans
Promotes a healthy and productive workforce

group-benefits.name: Income Protector
group-benefits.description: Provides a monthly income if you are unable to work due to a qualifying disability.
benefits: Replaces a portion of your lost income
Helps you maintain your standard of living

group-benefits.name: Accidental AD & Disability
group-benefits.description: Covers long and short-term disabilities, as well as Accidental Death & Dismemberment.

advisors.name: Jessica Miller
advisors.title: Senior Life & Health Advisor
advisors.bio: With over 15 years of experience, Jessica specializes in creating comprehensive life and health insurance strategies for families and individuals, ensuring their long-term security.

advisors.name: Brian Carter
advisors.title: Property & Commercial Specialist
advisors.bio: Brian is an expert in property and commercial lines, helping business owners and homeowners protect their most valuable assets with tailored coverage.

advisors.name: Samantha Chen
advisors.title: Family & Auto Protection Advisor
advisors.bio: Samantha is passionate about helping young families and individuals find affordable and effective coverage for their cars, homes, and loved ones.

youtube_videos.title: Term vs. Whole Life Insurance Explained
youtube_videos.description: Understand the key differences between term and whole life insurance to decide which is right for you.

youtube_videos.title: Understanding Annuities: A Beginner's Guide
youtube_videos.description: Learn the basics of annuities and how they can provide a steady income stream during retirement.

document_resources.title: Financial Fact Finder
document_resources.description: A comprehensive worksheet to help you organize your finances and plan for your family's future.

document_resources.title: Home Inventory Checklist
document_resources.description: A helpful guide and template for creating a home inventory for your property insurance records.
